message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you the opportunity to purchase this product. Given its value, I'm asking for $20,000. I believe this is a fair price considering its worth. What do you think?
I appreciate your time, Alice. I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $18,000. Would you be willing to consider this price?
Thanks for the offer, Bob. I understand your perspective on the price. While $18,000 is tempting, I'm aiming for something closer to $19,000. Would you be willing to meet me halfway?
